title: mist won't start
body:
Hi there,

I started mist 0.9.3 from windows powershell with no argument and it stocked on "Ethereum node needs to sync" "looking for peers..." but never ends and clicking on "Launch application" does not work.

bytheway ethereum wallet 0.9.3 works fine (even on running multiple instances) and whole my network is local on my own device

here is what I see in powershell:
```
PS F:\source\EthereumInUseTools\Mist-win64-0-9-3\win-unpacked> .\Mist.exe
PS F:\source\EthereumInUseTools\Mist-win64-0-9-3\win-unpacked>
[2018-02-08 18:41:24.643] [INFO] main - Running in production mode: true
[2018-02-08 18:41:24.729] [INFO] EthereumNode - undefined null 'fast'

[2018-02-08 18:41:26.231] [INFO] Windows - Creating commonly-used windows

    at Object.onceWrapper (events.js:293:19)
    at emitOne (events.js:101:20)
    at ClientRequest.emit (events.js:191:7)
    at TLSSocket.socketErrorListener (_http_client.js:358:9)
    at emitOne (events.js:96:13)
    at TLSSocket.emit (events.js:191:7)

    at _combinedTickCallback (internal/process/next_tick.js:80:11)

  host: 'api.github.com',

  path: '/repos/ethereum/mist/releases' }

    at ClientRequest.req.once.err (F:\source\EthereumInUseTools\Mist-win64-0-9-3\win-unpacked\resources\app.asar\node_modules\got\index.js:73:21)
    at Object.onceWrapper (events.js:293:19)
    at emitOne (events.js:101:20)

[2018-02-08 18:41:36.587] [INFO] Sockets/node-ipc - Connect to {"path":"\\\\.\\pipe\\geth.ipc"}

[2018-02-08 18:42:00.246] [INFO] NodeSync - Sync has been skipped
[2018-02-08 18:42:00.247] [INFO] NodeSync - Sync loop ended
```

Please open an issue on the Mist repository https://github.com/ethereum/mist/issues. I don't see anything Geth related in the logs.
